mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id AS noticeId, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.created_at AS createdAt, n.updated_at AS updatedAt, n.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname AS authorName, n.image_path AS imagePath, n.attachment_path AS attachmentPath, n.attachment_name AS attachmentName FROM Notice n LEFT JOIN Member m ON n.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY n.notice_id DESC

SELECT n.notice_id AS noticeId, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.created_at AS createdAt, n.updated_at AS updatedAt, n.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname AS authorName, n.last_modified_by AS lastModifiedBy, m2.nickname AS modifierName, n.image_path AS imagePath, n.attachment_path AS attachmentPath, n.attachment_name AS attachmentName FROM Notice n LEFT JOIN Member m ON n.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN Member m2 ON n.last_modified_by = m2.member_id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice ( title, content, member_id, image_path, attachment_path, attachment_name, views, created_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId}, #{imagePath}, #{attachmentPath}, #{attachmentName}, 0, NOW() )
